sentences.en: But change brought about the growth and consolidation of the working class.
sentences.cn: 但是变革使得工人阶级发展壮大起来。

sentences.en: But we have to prepare also for the next phase: fiscal consolidation.
sentences.cn: 但我们也须为下一阶段 —— 即财政巩固——做好准备.

sentences.en: Consolidation settlement occurs mainly in clays or silts.
sentences.cn: 压缩沉降主要出现在粘土或粉沙中.

sentences.en: During the late consolidation stage of sedimentation, mineralized solution are squeezed into fractures.
sentences.cn: 在沉积物固结的晚期, 矿化溶液渗入到裂隙中.

sentences.en: Enable users to submit consolidation nodes, even if not all leaf nodes have been opened.
sentences.cn: 允许用户提交合并结点，即使并非所有的叶子节点都已打开。

sentences.en: Examination shows consolidation which usually affects one or both lung bases.
sentences.cn: 检查可见实变,常波及一侧或双侧肺底部.

sentences.en: Large - scale consolidation and compaction of soil were responsible for a major part of the destruction.
sentences.cn: 大部分破坏都是由于土壤的大规模固结和压密所造成的.

sentences.en: Large-scale consolidation and compaction of soil were responsible for  the destruction.
sentences.cn: 大部分破坏都是由于土壤的大规模固结和压密所造成的。

sentences.en: Mechanization has contributed to the consolidation of farms in larger holdings.
sentences.cn: 机械化已使大型农场得到了巩固.

sentences.en: NAS is a consolidation of storage over a network for access by heterogeneous clients at the file level.
sentences.cn: NAS 是通过网络的存储合并，以便不同类型客户端在文件级别进行访问。

sentences.en: Next year consolidation will continue, though at a less busy pace.
sentences.cn: 合并明年还将继续, 不过步子会稍慢一些.

sentences.en: The areas of consolidation are firmer than the surrounding lung.
sentences.cn: 实变区域比周围的肺组织坚韧.

sentences.en: The combination of the friendship, the heart of the mystery! The beautifier of life, the consolidation of society!
sentences.cn: 友谊，那心灵的神秘的结合者！生活的美化者，社会的巩固者！

sentences.en: The consolidation of the beautifier of life, the society.
sentences.cn: 生活的美化者，社会的巩固者。

sentences.en: The denser population necessitates closer consolidation both for internal and external action.
sentences.cn: 住得日益稠密的居民,对内和对外都不得不更紧密地团结起来.

sentences.en: The reason for this tremendous consolidation is not hard to find.
sentences.cn: 这种产生大量合并的原因是不难发现的.

sentences.en: This allows the user greater flexibility in planning for server consolidation or expansion by having the option of adding more users or additional applications.
sentences.cn: 通过增加更多用户或附加的应用程序，允许用户在服务器合并或扩展的规划中具有更大的灵活性。

sentences.en: This consolidation meant having to reduce the numerical strength of the Army.
sentences.cn: 这次合并意味着不得不削减陆军的兵力。

sentences.en: Thursday consolidation dollar to continue to shock, and the overall steady.
sentences.cn: 周四英镑兑美元继续盘整震荡, 也总体持稳.

sentences.en: X - ray chest film or CT showed multi - node and patchy consolidation.
sentences.cn: 线胸片或ct显示双肺多发结节影和斑片状浸润影.

words.tran_cn: 巩固的；统一的；整理过的
合并；巩固（consolidate的过去分词形式）；统一

phrases.tran_cn: 固结系数；压实系数；土的物理性质压密系数
固结沉降；地基应力和变形固结沉降
固结试验，圧密试験；室内土工试验
次固结，次生固结；二次固结

trans.tran_en: the act of consolidating or state of being consolidated
